subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Geno Smith, the Jets’ second-year quarterback, has shown more certainty as he tries to fully grasp the playbook assembled by Marty Mornhinweg, the Jets’ veteran offensive coordinator.
snippet: Geno Smith, the Jets’ second-year quarterback, has shown more certainty as he tries to fully grasp the playbook assembled by Marty Mornhinweg, the Jets’ veteran offensive coordinator.
